function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistency in virus survival due to environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Controversy regarding air as a vector for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of air pollution on viral infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures during evacuation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of protective measures face masks, social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in air samples collected from patient’s rooms in hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of indoor surfaces and air with covid-19 virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High viral loads found in specific areas like toilets, bathrooms, and staff areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within a community due to shared building infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air and surfaces in healthcare facilities and nursing homes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Control of indoor temperature and humidity during the epidemic period.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 in restaurant settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration and aerosol exposure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence for cost-efficient interventions for indoor transmission of respiratory infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recycled air in ventilation and air conditioning systems can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation leading to misunderstanding of covid-19 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No evidence that air purifiers alone effectively reduce covid-19 transmission, potential false sense of security.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection likelihood exceeding 1% with exposure time exceeding 2 hours","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact settings increase the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Activities with increased particle emission raise the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or emphasis on the effectiveness of engineering controls for reducing airborne infection risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and quarantine measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution due to lockdown measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of preventive measures such as social distancing and mask-wearing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in covid-19 cases after relaxation of preventive measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Congregating highly susceptible individuals with those likely to have tb disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expense of negative-pressure mechanical ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate dependency of natural ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of upper-room uv light in healthcare facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exhaust vents positioned in the lower part of the room may lead to air contamination and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wire mesh floors in animal cages may not effectively prevent faecal-oral transmission of tb.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of uv lights and their maintenance may expose healthcare staff and patients to adverse uv effects.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among guinea pigs due to ventilation and ionization of air","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to ozone from ionizers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of improper handling and disposal of infected animals","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous operation of uv lights and fans may lead to maintenance issues and malfunction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective sterilization and exhaust of air may lead to contamination and disease spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure of guinea pigs to ward air may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control intervention in the control group","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imbalanced airflow between animal enclosures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of statistical analysis to compare tb infections between groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired infections from smear-positive hiv patients with pulmonary tb","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air mixing in patient wards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate animal ethical approval and supervision","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diminished uv intensity at height 1.8 m","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High negative ion concentration in the ionizer enclosure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dust-related tb outbreak due to ionizer cleaning","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in the exposure chambers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity of tb-infected animals in exposure chambers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
